mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE M_STATUS = 1

select * from (select rownum rn, a.m_name, a.m_empnum, a.m_birth, a.m_phone, a.m_email, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name from (select * from member where m_status = 1 order by m_name) a, position p, department d where a.dpt_code = d.dpt_code and a.pt_code = p.pt_code) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select count(*) from address ad, address_group ag where ad.adg_num = ag.adg_num and ad.adg_num = ${adg_num}

select * from (select rownum rn, a.m_name, a.m_empnum, a.m_birth, a.m_phone, a.m_email, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name from (select * from member where m_status = 1 and m_id IN (select ad.m_id from address ad, address_group ag where ad.adg_num = ag.adg_num and ad.adg_num = ${adg_num}) order by m_name) a, position p, department d where a.dpt_code = d.dpt_code and a.pt_code = p.pt_code) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
